description: This file defines functions for emitting C++ code that relates to RPC (Remote Procedure Call) mechanisms, including event emission, registration, and deregistration, primarily for a JSON-RPC based system. It features complex code generation logic for serialization, deserialization, and managing RPC interfaces, including handling notifications and method binding.

methods.name: EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False)
methods.description: Generates C++ code for emitting an event, including serialization of parameters and optional send-if logic.

methods.name: _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])
methods.description: Generates the prologue section of the RPC C++ code including includes, namespace declarations, and versioning.

methods.name: _EmitRpcEpilogue(root, emit, ns)
methods.description: Closes namespaces and finalizes the RPC code emission.

methods.name: _EmitVersionCode(emit, version)
methods.description: Emits C++ namespace with version information constants.

methods.name: _EmitRpcCode(root, emit, ns, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Main function to generate the full RPC C++ interface code including registration functions.

methods.name: EmitRpcCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Public interface to emit the full RPC code, including prologue and epilogue.

methods.name: EmitRpcVersionCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Emits the version namespace and version info in the RPC code.

methods.name: _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")

ctags.name: EmitEvent
ctags.pattern: /^def EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False):$/

ctags.name: _EmitRpcPrologue
ctags.pattern: /^def _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = []):$/
ctags.signature: (root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])

ctags.name: _Invoke
ctags.pattern: /^            def _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", re/
ctags.signature: (params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")
